entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
